text: Erwin Eisch (; 18 April 1927 â€“ 25 January 2022) was a German artist. He worked with glass. He was also a painter, draughtsman, and printmaker. Eisch was known for his works with Harvey Littleton. Their works helped created the studio glass movement. Eisch died in Zwiesel, Germany on 25 January 2022, at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German artists Category:People from Bavaria
title: Erwin Eisch
